title: react-portfolio
description: The code for this project is built using React and Vite, without using other libaries. This approach improve my coding skills in these technologies without the aid of libraries that might simplify the process.

title: Joselito's adventure

title: Fruttask
description: Fruttask, a project I'm currently developing, utilizes AstroJS and NestJS. It's designed to deepen my skills and explore new technologies. Currently in progress
